original_title: BBP ビッグブラックペニスに堕ちた女捜査官
overview: Riho, a female detective who succeeded in identifying the hiding place by grasping the whole picture of the vicious human trafficking organization, headed for the organization's hideout with a feeling for her sister who was once a victim of horrific trafficking. ….
title: BBP. The Female Detective Who Fell For A Big Black Penis. Riho Fujimori
